text: musa, tam'ma janangadavarodane helidaru; nimage allahanu nidiruva anugrahagalannu nenapisikolliri. (Visesavagi) avanu nim'mannu phirâ€Œaunana janangadavarinda vimocisidanu. Avaru nim'mannu bahala kettadagi pidisuttiddaru, nim'ma putrara koralu koyyuttiddaru mattu nim'ma putriyarannu matra jivanta viduttiddaru. Adu nim'ma odeyana kadeyinda (nim'ma palige) bhari parikseyagittu
